ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Player wipe on Test
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I m sorry.  No offense Sylly.  You re an intelligent guy but your attitude and absolute lack of compassion leave me cold. ... Hold on a sec there, bub...
ygData.messageBody:
>
I'm sorry. No offense Sylly. You're an intelligent guy but your attitude
and absolute lack of compassion leave me cold.
>

Hold on a sec there, bub... it was "Perhaps a Princess" who posted that.
See below...

>
Um. That is part of playing on Test. It is one of the things you agree
to. I played on Test for a while (Faesong started there got a bubble or so
from 17 before I decided to recreate her on Sol Ro) It was accepted that
Verant could do anything they wanted with
Test. Its not a production server. They HAVE done player wipes before.

Sarah Heacock sarah@...
Meara Daring, level 28 Enchanter, Master Jeweler, owner Meara's Boutique of
Mystiques, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faerain Wanderer, level 20 Soldier of Tunare, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faesong, level 17 HalfElf Bard of Solusek Ro, Phoenix, Solusek Ro (Qeynos) /
Jidranth, lvl 8 Iskar Warrior, Solusek Ro, Phoenix /
>
